catalogue_description: Hebrew and Judaica Manuscripts at the Bodleian Libraries, Oxford University
title: Miscellany
author: Abraham ha-Bavli
description: Contents: Avraham ha-Bavli, Sefer ha-Shorashim (ff. 1r-6r). List of homonyms found in Moses ibn Ezra's Sefer ha-ʿAnaḳ (ff. 6r-10v). Salomon ben Abraham ibn Parḥon, Maḥberet ha-ʿArukh (ff. 11r-230(ii)v). List of homonyms found in Moses ibn Ezra's Sefer ha-Tarshish (ff. 232r-237v). Alphabet of Ben Sira (ff. 237v-255r). Berechiah ben Natronai ha-Nakdan, Mishle shuʻalim (ff. 256r-290r). Aggadic legends (ff. 290v-291v). Mishle Sendebar (ff. 292r-300r). Aggadic legends (ff. 300r-339v). Divre ha-yamim le-Mosheh Rabenu (ff. 340r-346v). Midrash Aśeret ha-Dibrot (Midrash on the Ten Commandments) (ff. 346v-352r). Midrash ṿa-Yoshaʿ (ff. 352r-356r). Igerot shel Dibrot (ff. 356r-358v). Otot aśar milḥamot melekh ha-Mesiaḥ (ff. 358v-361r). Menaḥem ben Perets ha-Ḥebroni, Masaʿ be-erets Yiśaʾel (ff. 361r-363v).
